scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix backend install
scripts.start:dev: concurrently 'npm run --prefix client start' 'npm run --prefix backend start'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm run start" "cd backend && PORT=3080 npm run start"
